oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Dia!kwain (David Hoesar) (V)
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The power of Game Sorcerers continues after death. Prayer addressed to them by the mother of narrator. (L V.-11. 4801 rev.-4809 rev.). Dia!kwain's mother tells of spirit-people who are dead game's sorcerers. The people do not see them but their sorcery is still around and they do not altogether die. There follows her prayer to the spirits of the sorcerers who formerly possessed game. 1) See also The power over ostriches possessed by Dia!kwain's uncle |uherre, 2) This story is found in Book V-11.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Lucy Lloyd |xam notebooks
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: |nu-!ke or magicians who have died still possess power, and =kamme-an's prayer to them
